sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.SN, b.CODE_NM as OPEN_API_SVC_NM, c.CODE_NM as OPEN_API_PROVD_INSTT_NM, a.COLLECT_DT FROM COMTNOPENAPI a, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE b, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c WHERE a.OPEN_API_SVC_CODE_ID = b.CODE_ID AND a.OPEN_API_SVC_CODE = b.CODE AND a.OPENAPI_PROVD_INSTT_CODE_ID = c.CODE_ID AND a.OPENAPI_PROVD_INSTT_CODE = c.CODE
c.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
b.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY a.SN DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(a.SN) FROM COMTNOPENAPI a, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE b, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c WHERE a.OPEN_API_SVC_CODE_ID = b.CODE_ID AND a.OPEN_API_SVC_CODE = b.CODE AND a.OPENAPI_PROVD_INSTT_CODE_ID = c.CODE_ID AND a.OPENAPI_PROVD_INSTT_CODE = c.CODE
c.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
b.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')

SELECT a.SN, a.MBER_ID, b.CODE_NM as OPEN_API_SVC_NM, c.CODE_NM as OPEN_API_PROVD_INSTT_NM, a.OPEN_API_SVC_CN, a.COLLECT_DT FROM COMTNOPENAPI a, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE b, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c WHERE a.OPEN_API_SVC_CODE_ID = b.CODE_ID AND a.OPEN_API_SVC_CODE = b.CODE AND a.OPENAPI_PROVD_INSTT_CODE_ID = c.CODE_ID AND a.OPENAPI_PROVD_INSTT_CODE = c.CODE AND a.SN = #sn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNOPENAPI (SN, MBER_ID, OPEN_API_SVC_CODE_ID, OPEN_API_SVC_CODE, OPEN_API_SVC_CN, OPENAPI_PROVD_INSTT_CODE_ID, OPENAPI_PROVD_INSTT_CODE, COLLECT_DT) VALUES (#sn#, #mberId#, (SELECT CODE_ID FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_NM = #openApiSvcNm#), (SELECT CODE FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_NM = #openApiSvcNm#), #openApiSvcCn#, (SELECT CODE_ID FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_NM = #openApiProvdInsttNm#), (SELECT CODE FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_NM = #openApiProvdInsttNm#), SYSDATE())
